--truncate table DEL_TMP_P_1_rev --/
insert --+ append into SMC_EXCHANGE_LISTING_INFO_S partition(rev_0) select --+parallel p.* from SMC_EXCHANGE_LISTING_INFO partition(rev_0) p, SMC_SECURITY_LAST_UPDATE partition(rev_0) ss where p.SMCP = ss.smcp /
commit /
